mapper.select: select from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED ORDER by MODEL_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED ORDER by MODEL_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(MODEL_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(MODEL_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED

select * from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_ORDER_NUM = (select max(MODEL_ORDER_NUM) from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_ORDER_NUM<(select MODEL_ORDER_NUM from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_ORDER_NUM = (select min(MODEL_ORDER_NUM) from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_ORDER_NUM>(select MODEL_ORDER_NUM from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select , from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_RE_KEY=#{ruKey} ORDER by MODEL_LAST_VERSION DESC

select from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_LAST_RE_ED='是' and MODEL_STATUS='启用' and MODEL_MODULE_ID in (select MODULE_ID from tbuild_module where MODULE_LINK_ID=#{linkId}) order by MODEL_ORDER_NUM DESC

select from TFLOW_MODEL_INTEGRATED where MODEL_ID in
#{id}
